item.description:
Fowler House

This is the original place for the Skidaddlers Weekly Happy Hour! We would meet every Thursday and would always have 20-30 people. It's a great opportunity to bring new friends and get to meet the Skidaddlers.

Come on out, toss your responsibilities away and kick back with a tasty beverage drink and good conversation. You know you want to

Fowler House
Quincy Center T- turn left on Hancock St about 5 minute walk.

Guys if you have a favorite watering hole let us know!!!! We can have the next "Thirsty Thursday" there.
item.name: "Thirsty Thursdays"
